content.name: Nostromo
content.description:
Commercial Towing Ship Nostromo, is equivalent to an XL Freighter.
Its size is comparable to ships like Condor or Asgard. It is really a connection between a L towboat and a L container.
Since it cant have less hit points than a large container, the Nostromo have a hull twice more strong than an Asgard. Here we can see how X4 lack of rule and method leading in lots of incoherence.
Rougly CTS Nostromo is fast but horribly clumsy giant freighter. It have a strong structure but few shield (provided by the L towboat)
It have no docking bay nor hatch, but have crews facilities.
The Nostromo usually has a crew of seven, although there are rumors of an eighth.
Language french and english, require tide of avarice DLC.
Ship available from Teladis and ministry shipyards.
